sentence.Network_en: In no case will they look on passively.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们决不会在一边看热闹.

sentence.Network_en: He sat there passively, content to wait for his father to make the opening move.
sentence.Network_cn: 他温顺地坐在那里，心满意足地等着他父亲走第一步棋。

sentence.Network_en: They were at first grudgingly and later passively accepted.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们起先是不情愿地,后来是消极地接受了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Second, I would suggest he give us specific (具体的) tasks with deadlines so that we know what we must finish instead of passively (被动地).

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... passion n 激情 passive a 消极的，被动的 impassive a 冷漠的.

entry.tran: 被动的；顺从的；听之任之的
entry.def: If you describe someone as passive, you mean that they do not take action but instead let things happen to them.

example.ex: His passive attitude made things easier for me...
example.tran: 他顺从的态度让我做起事来要轻松些。

example.ex: Even passive acceptance of the regime was a kind of collaboration.
example.tran: 即使被动接受该政权也是一种通敌行为。

entry.def: A passive activity involves watching, looking at, or listening to things rather than doing things.

example.ex: They want less passive ways of filling their time.
example.tran: 他们想找些更为积极的方式来打发时间。

example.ex: ...the passive enjoyment one gets from  looking at a painting or sculpture.
example.tran: 观看绘画或雕塑获得的被动享受

entry.def: Passive resistance involves showing opposition to the people in power in your country by not co-operating with them and protesting in non-violent ways.

example.ex: They made it clear that they would only exercise passive resistance in the event of a military takeover.
example.tran: 他们声明一旦发生军事接管，他们只会采取非暴力抵抗。

entry.def: In grammar, the passive or the passive voice is formed using 'be' and the past participle of a verb. The subject of a passive clause does not perform the action expressed by the verb but is affected by it. For example, in 'He's been murdered', the verb is in the passive.

auth_sentence.content: Yes, they passively mimic their benchmark indexes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yes, they passively mimic their benchmark indexes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yes, they passively mimic their benchmark indexes.

auth_sentence.content: It has all come so pat, been accepted so passively.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has all come so pat, been accepted so passively.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has all come so pat, been accepted so passively.

auth_sentence.content: Most of them, Seligman observed, passively accepted the shocks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most of them, Seligman observed, passively accepted the shocks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most of them, Seligman observed, passively accepted the shocks.
